UnsupportedMappingException, WrongClassException, XmlInfrastructureException, XsdException
public class HibernateException extends PersistenceException
The base type for exceptions thrown by Hibernate.

Note that every exception arising from the JDBC layer is wrapped in some form of JDBCException.
